subject: Power adapter on Plus X
description_text:
Good day,

I was emailing to reach out for some assistance. After purchasing the
pedals I noticed on the control module that there’s a plug for a DC power
adapter. I think I’ve lost mine and wanted to ask what power input it
requires so that I may get a replacement. I look forward to hearing from
you.

With gratitude,
Andre Berg

conversations.body_text: Hi Andre,    Please don't worry. If you haven't purchased Haptics, you can use the pedal directly without needing the power supply.

Hi,

Thanks for letting me know. Good to know I can still use it without the
power supply. Really enjoying the product so far. I appreciate the
assistance.

Regards,

Andre
